rows.label: tlk70000035_02_msg0001
rows.name:
This country is a weird one. Folk
are kind even to strangers like us.

rows.label: tlk70000035_02_msg0002
rows.name:
People are often cold to traveling
performers like us. Especially in places
like Superbia.

rows.label: tlk70000035_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Iira's not like that, though. People
here are quick to trust. They don't
mind that we're different.

rows.label: tlk70000035_02_msg0004
rows.name:
I can also get behind the notion of
people and Blades coexisting.
